databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_TAX.MS_TAX_ID , MS_TAX.TAX_RATE , MS_TAX.TAX_CODE , MS_TAX.START_DATE , MS_TAX.DELETE_FLAG , MS_TAX.SEND_FLAG , MS_TAX.VESSEL_ID , MS_TAX.DATA_NO , MS_TAX.USER_KEY , MS_TAX.RENEW_DATE , MS_TAX.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_TAX.TS FROM MS_TAX
ORDER BY MS_TAX.MS_TAX_ID

INSERT INTO MS_TAX( MS_TAX_ID , TAX_RATE , TAX_CODE , START_DATE , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_TAX_ID , :TAX_RATE , :TAX_CODE , :START_DATE , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_TAX SET TAX_RATE = :TAX_RATE , TAX_CODE = :TAX_CODE , START_DATE = :START_DATE , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_TAX_ID = :MS_TAX_ID AND TS = :TS
